channel.title: New to the forums looking to start a server
channel.description: Well first off, nice to meet you. :P Second I am completely new to coding and what not, I read some tutorials but it all just seems like a bunch of symbols and letters, lol. Anyways, I am looking for a good server to start learning code on and maybe someone could help me one on one over skype or something. The only thing I've ever done with a server was when I got the client/source and somehow got to log in but every time I moved it disconnected. Kind Regards, ~Upwards~

wat… runesource isn’t winterlove.[/quote]i meant to say that runesource was done like a winterlove

item.title: New to the forums looking to start a server
item.dc:creator: @strucker Strucker
item.description:
@strucker wrote:

Upwards:

“I AM COMPLETELY NEW TO ALL OF THIS”

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars


here’s the server downloads section, at the right top there’s a search bar, i’d recommend you starting with a 317 revision, the most popular of them are:
Delta, Project insanity also called pi, runesource… blablabalba… those are all derivated from winterLove.
